EmailTemplate.name: Sunset Expiration Reminder
EmailTemplate.Body: #if ($role)Role $role #{else}Entitlement $entitlement #{end}belonging to $requestee which was requested by $requestor will be removed on $sunsetDate
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying the requestee and requestor when a Role or Entitlement is about to be sunsetted.

Argument.name: requestor
Argument.Description: The Identity of the original request to sunset the role or entitlement

Argument.name: requestee
Argument.Description: The Identity that the role or entitlement belongs to

Argument.name: sunsetDate
Argument.Description: The date that the role or entitlement will be removed on

EmailTemplate.Subject: Access Expiration Reminder
